targets.query:
from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["status", "_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r.status == "ONLINE" then 8 else 16}))

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_left_ns")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 60000000000.0}))

import "experimental/array"

load = from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load_percent")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

power = from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "nominal_power")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

dailyCost = (float(v: power._value) * (float(v: load._value) / 100.0) * 24.0 * 0.2668) / 1000.0

array.from(rows: [{_time: now(), _value: dailyCost}])

import "experimental/array"

load = from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load_percent")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

power = from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "nominal_power")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

monthlyCost = (float(v: power._value) * (float(v: load._value) / 100.0) * 24.0 * 30.0 * 0.2668) / 1000.0

array.from(rows: [{_time: now(), _value: monthlyCost}])

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 86400.0}))

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "running")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "n_containers_running")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.interface == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.interface == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cached")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "buffered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_user" or r._field == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu != "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["cpu", "_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["cpu"])

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_recv")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -8.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Read")

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Write")

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "reads")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Read ops")

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "writes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Write ops")

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["path"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["path", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp_c")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "device"])

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "unraid")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
